short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that adds historical price trends to coles.com.au

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your shopping experience on Coles.com.au with the Coles Trend!
This Chrome extension seamlessly integrates historical price trends directly into Coles product pages, helping you make informed purchasing decisions based on price history over the last 10 price changes.

Features:

Historical Price Bar Chart: Instantly view a bar chart displaying the price history of each product over the past 10 price changes.
Easy Integration: The price chart is embedded directly into the product page for a smooth and intuitive user experience.
Real-Time Updates: Get up-to-date price history information every time you visit a product page on Coles.com.au.
Interactive Charts: Hover over the bars in the chart to see detailed price information for specific dates.
User-Friendly Interface: Clean, simple, and easy-to-read charts make understanding price trends a breeze.
How It Works:

Install the Extension: Add the Coles Price History Tracker extension to your Chrome browser.
Browse Coles.com.au: Visit any product page on Coles.com.au.
View Price History: The extension will automatically display a bar chart with the productâ€™s price history over the last 10 price changes.

Why Use Coles Price History Tracker?

Smart Shopping: Make better buying decisions by knowing when to purchase based on past price trends.
Save Money: Identify the best times to buy your favorite products at the lowest prices.
Transparency: Gain insights into how prices fluctuate, ensuring you get the best deals available.

Your privacy is important to us. The Coles Price History Tracker does not collect or store any personal data from your browsing activities. The extension solely accesses product price information to provide you with accurate and helpful price history charts.
